categoryDefinitions.$description: These categories are applied to nodes in the ROS1 Bridge (semu namespace)
categoryDefinitions.semuRos: Nodes implementing functionality for ROS1 Interoperability
categoryDefinitions.semuRos:publisher: Nodes that publish a ROS1 message
categoryDefinitions.semuRos:subscriber: Nodes that subscribe to a ROS1 message
categoryDefinitions.semuRos:service: Nodes that provide rosservice in ROS1
categoryDefinitions.semuRos:action: Nodes that provide actionlib in ROS1
